actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to permit the enlistment of Vietnamese and Cambodian refugees into the Armed Forces of the United States under certain circumstances.

summary.text: Permits the enlistment of specified Vietnamese and Cambodian refugees into the Armed Forces of the United States under specified circumstances which include their declaration to become United States citizens. Provides that the authority granted under this Act shall expire 12 months after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit the enlistment of Vietnamese and Cambodian refugees into the Armed Forces of the United States under certain circumstances.
